title: Summer sundaes
description: These healthy sundaes are packed with oats, yoghurt and fruit. Try them as a quick summer dessert.

show.b01ncdlj: I Can Cook on the Go

steps: Mix the oats, orange juice, sunflower seeds and pumpkin seeds together in a bowl and set aside for 15 minutes, or until the oats have soaked up all the juice.
Divide the oat mixture between two small glasses, then add a layer of banana. Spoon in the yoghurt, then top with the berries.
